__TOC__

* Contact: <nowiki>[[JohnCBarstow]]</nowiki>
* Make: Toshiba
* Model: Tecra 8000 (PAT 800C)

=== Current Issues ===

* Installer incorrectly believes FireWire is available (<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/hw-detect/+bug/25033|#25033]]</nowiki>)
* Display does not default to the correct resolution(<nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/distros/ubuntu/+source/xorg/+bug/25079|#25079]]</nowiki>)
